titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on diaper pads with an outer layer of water-resistant laminated knitted fabric of polyester and with a layer or layers of certified organic cotton.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/8/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on diaper pads with an outer layer of water-resistant laminated knitted fabric of polyester and with a layer or layers of certified organic cotton.
